app[content][about]: [h2]Any-Shape 3D Maps[/h2][p][img src="{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/maps.gif"][/img]Play on the surface of any 3D shape, such as a planet, potato, horseshoe, or gear. Perhaps several islands floating in void connected with small bridges. Perhaps a stuck clockwork.[/p][p]Most places can be ambushed from many directions. Units may shoot across void, if visible and in range.[/p][p]Determining the strategic value of various positions on the map is a crucial skill to master the game.[/p][h2]Resources In The World[/h2][p][img src="{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/resources.jpg"][/img][/p][p]There is over a dozen types of resources: raw ores, intermediate goods, and military parts.[/p][p]All resources are on pallets or in boxes, existing directly in the world, and requiring transportation. Trucks are controlled automatically.[/p][p]UW has no technology tree or research. Progression is achieved through acquiring or refining new resources.[/p][h2]Strategy Game, Not Action Game[/h2][p][img src="{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/strategy.jpg"][/img]The game supports up to few thousands of units on the battlefield. Therefore, you must focus on thoughtful planning and strategic placement of your armies.[/p][p]Individual units micromanagement is avoided wherever possible. Units have no user-activated skills. Just attack-move or leave them alone, and the units will do the best, on their own.[/p][p]Also ensure protection of your supply lines.[/p][h2]Virtual Reality[/h2][p][img src="{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/virtual-reality.gif"][/img]The unique maps of Unnatural Worlds make the game a perfect fit for virtual reality, marking it the first RTS game in VR.[/p][p]You hold the world in one hand and issue commands to your units with the other hand.[/p][p]Cross-play is possible.[/p]
app[content][short_description]: Revolutionary grand-scale RTS game played on maps of any 3D shape. It emphasizes base building and logistics, careful planning, and minimizes micro-management of units.
